patterns: I have weakness in my body.
responses: Okay. Can you tell me what's wrong? What are your symptoms?
Okay, this is a symptom of cold, do you have cold?
Take ½ teaspoon of Haldi powder and ½ teaspoon of pepper powder with milk add a 1 teaspoon honey, 3 times a day. It helps you in cold.
Good, now take some rest.
What kind of cough do you have : 1. Wet cough 2. Dry cough
Wet cough - Take 1 teaspoon honey. Add 1 teaspoon of ginger juice and 1 pinch of black pepper. Take once in the morning and once before going to bed at night to get relief from Wet cough.

Dry cough - Basil (Tulsi) leaves and ginger are very effective in relieving an irritating dry cough. You can either chew basil (tulsi) leaves or take fresh ginger with hot water. It helps you in dry cough

Basil (Tulsi) is an effective herb & It help reduce fever very quickly.                Take about 20 basil (tulsi) leaves and boil them, now add 1 teaspoon of crushed ginger in the strained tulsi water, and boil until the solution gets reduced to half. Add a little honey and drink this tea two or three times a day for three days to get relief from fever.
This is a symptom of fever, Take tea/decoction of about 20 Tulsi leaves 3 times a day till fever subsides. It helps you in fever/shivering.
what kind of headache do you have : 1. Migrane headache - Pain feels like a tight band around your head. 2. Cluster headache - Pain strikes in a group 3. Tension Headache - Ocassional
Migraine Headache - You can drink ginger and basil (tulsi) leaves tea throughout the day when you have pain and don't forget to have it right at the onset of pain.

Cluster Headache - Ginger is known to help reduce the inflammation of the blood vessels in the head, providing relief. One can consume ginger to prevent headaches. Mix equal parts of ginger juice and lemon juice and have it daily twice.

Tension Headache - Apply heat to relieve tense neck and shoulder muscles. Use a heating pad set on low, a hot water bottle, a hot shower or bath, a warm compress, or a hot towel. Or apply ice or a cool washcloth to the forehead. Massage also can relieve muscle tension — and sometimes headache pain.
Powder of Sonth (dry ginger), Soonf, Pudina dry and equal quantity, boil 1 teaspoon of this mix powder in a cup of water, take 3 times after food to get relief from Heart burn / Acidity.
Take 1 teaspoon of fresh ginger juice and 1 teaspoon of lemon juice add a pinch of Black salt and Zeera ½ teaspoon powder take 3 times after food. It helps you in indigestion.
Cut one medium size onion in pieces, fry in 1 teaspoon of ghee till it becomes soft eat the whole quantity with a glass of hot water at bed time for 3-5 days. It helps you in constipation.
Crush the Lajwanti plant (Touch me not) apply over the wound Cut Aloe vera leaf into two lengthwise and sprinkle turmeric powder on it place on the wound and bandage.

Prepare oil by boiling 100 gms of Neem leaves and Pudina leaves in mustard oil add 1 teaspoon of salt, boil on low flame for ½ hr, apply on affected area and massage till oil is absorbed 2 times in a day till pain is relieved.

Powder Methi, Kalonji and Tukhme Kasni (Chicory seeds Cichorium intybus) equal quantity, take ½ teaspoon daily before food 3 times. Eat plenty of vegetables like Guar beans, Knolkhol, Karela, Bhindi. It helps you in diabetes.
